trans-unit.source: Keep me posted on this and similar campaigns.
trans-unit.target: Żommni aġġornat dwar dan u azzjonijiet simili.

trans-unit.source: Attention: You will receive a confirmation email. Check your email inbox (and junk folder) now! To confirm your action, click the link given in the email.
trans-unit.target: Attenzjoni: Int ser tirċievi konferma bl-emajl. Iċċekkja l-posta riċevuta tal-emajl tiegħek (u l-fowlder tal-posta mhux mixtieqa) issa! Sabiex tikkonferma l-azzjoni tiegħek, ikklikkja l-link fl-emajl.

trans-unit.source: Attention: You've already taken part in this action (maybe on another website).
trans-unit.target: Attenzjoni: Int diġà ħadt sehem f’din l-azzjoni (forsi fuq websajt oħra).

trans-unit.source: Your email is being validated, please wait!
You verified your email address. Your action is confirmed. Use this moment to tell friends and family.
trans-unit.target: Int ivverifikajt l-indirizz tal-emajl tiegħek. L-azzjoni tiegħek hija kkonfermata. Uża dan il-mument sabiex tgħid lill-ħbieb u lil tal-familja.

trans-unit.source: Separate email addresses with a comma.
We have sent an email with information about this campaign to the address(es) specified.
trans-unit.target: Aħna bgħatna emajl bl-informazzjoni dwar din il-kampanja lill-indirizz(i) speċifikat(i).

trans-unit.source: Help us fund this campaign. Give whatever you can now using the safe and secure paypal form below.
trans-unit.target: Għinna jiffinanzja din il-kampanja. Agħti kwalunkwe inti issa tista 'tuża l-formola paypal u sikuri hawn taħt.

trans-unit.source: The action starts on #DATE#. Stay tuned and spread the word!
trans-unit.target: L-azzjoni tibda f’#DATE#. Oqgħod sintonizzat u xerred il-kelma!

trans-unit.source: This action is over. Thanks to the #COUNTER# people who signed-up!
trans-unit.target: Din l-azzjoni ntemmet. Grazzi għan-nies tal #COUNTER# li ffirmaw!

trans-unit.source: Email Validation Landingpage - auto forwarding to external page
trans-unit.target: Il-paġna ta' destinazzjoni tal-emajl ta’ konferma għal-opt-in (HTTP://…)

trans-unit.source: You may define a precise widget width. Select "auto" and the widget will adapt to the space available (max: 1000px). Should there be less than 440px width available, contents will display in one column (instead of two) with the sign-on-form below the petition text. On mobile devices with less than 768px device-width, the widget-width is set to 360px for smooth reading on smartphones.
trans-unit.target: Inti tista 'tiddefinixxi wisa widget preċiża. Agħżel "auto" u l-widget se jadattaw għall-ispazju disponibbli (max: 1000px). Jekk ikun hemm inqas minn 440px wisa disponibbli, il-kontenut se display fil-kolonna waħda (minflok tnejn) mal-sinjal fuq formola t'hawn taħt it-test petizzjoni. Fuq apparat mobbli b'inqas minn 768px mezz-wisa, l-widget-wisa huwa stabbilit li 360px għall-qari bla xkiel fuq smartphones.

trans-unit.source: Customise contents: use your own words to convince your target group. To change the title, introduction and background texts, copy the texts from the edit fields into a text editor, make your changes and paste them back into the edit fields. Thereafter, adapt the width and the colours to seamlessly integrate the widget into your website design.
trans-unit.target: Jippersonalizzaw kontenut: uża kliem tiegħek stess biex tikkonvinċi grupp fil-mira tiegħek. Biex jinbidlu t-testi titolu, Introduzzjoni u sfond, kopja it-testi mill-oqsma jeditjaw fi editur test, jagħmlu bidliet tiegħek u paste lura fl-oqsma jeditjaw. Wara dan, tadatta l-wisa 'u l-kuluri li seamlessly jintegraw l-widget fid-disinn website tiegħek.

trans-unit.source: Choose 'Embed' to have this box ("widget") embedded into your webpage, including texts and action-form. Visitors can instantly read all and take action. However, you need at least 440px width to embed the widget. Choose 'Popup' if you lack sufficient space on your webpage. You will get a small box ("teaser") with flexible width (at least 150px). If visitors click on the teaser, the big action-widget pops up.
trans-unit.target: Agħżel ‘Embed’ sabiex ikollok din il-kaxxa ("widget") integrata fil-paġna tal-web tiegħek, inklużi testi u azzjoni-formola. Il-viżitaturi jistgħu istantanjament jaqraw kollox u jieħdu azzjoni. Madankollu, għandek bżonn mill-inqas 440px spazju sabiex tintegra l-widget. Agħżel "Popup" jekk m'għandekx spazju biżżejjed fuq il-paġna tal-web tiegħek. Inti ser tirċievi kaxxa żgħira ("teaser") b' wisa' flessibbli (mill-inqas 150px). Jekk il-viżitaturi jikklikkjaw fuq it-teaser, l-azzjoni ta’ widget kbira tippoppja.

trans-unit.source: Secure your pledge page with a password (optional).
trans-unit.target: Secure paġna wegħda tiegħek bil-password (mhux obbligatorju).

trans-unit.source: Password is too short. Use at least 8 characters.
trans-unit.target: Password huwa qasir wisq. Uża l-inqas 8 karattri.
